subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: If anything has been proved during the Stanley Cup finals between the veteran-laden Red Wings and the young, built-on-speed Penguins, it is that there are no foregone conclusions.
snippet: If anything has been proved during the Stanley Cup finals between the veteran-laden Red Wings and the young, built-on-speed Penguins, it is that there are no foregone conclusions.
